attributes.action: Let dancers whose career it is have private lessons!!
attributes.additional_details: We need the government to understand that a socially distanced dance private is no different from going on a socially distanced walk with your 78 year old grandmother. Please spread the word and help young people get to dance colleges and get footage recorded for auditions in the next coming months. Why should we have to suffer from the governments mistakes??
attributes.background: I really want the government to understand that young adults whose career dance is being affected by not being able to even have private lessons to record for online interviews and auditions. How are we meant to succeed when we don’t have the space, the equipment or facilities to even record footage

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

Allow all dance studios to open with covid safety precautions in place: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557275
